test.query: SELECT * FROM numbers_mt(100) AS l RIGHT JOIN numbers_mt(100000000) AS r USING (number) FORMAT Null

SELECT * FROM numbers_mt(100000000) AS l RIGHT JOIN numbers_mt(100000000) AS r USING (number) FORMAT Null
